name: Blubbercream
desc: Aqua-blue ice cream. The best way to while away a sweltering day is by enjoying some refreshing ice cream. It chills the body and cools the soul, giving one a feeling akin to having leaped into the sea, all worries dissipating as the heat flees your mouth, leaving naught but pure joy.

value.text: Increases all party members' DEF by 261 and healing effects by 8% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

customize.name: Recipe: Blubbercream
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Blubbercream.

customize.name: Delicious Blubbercream
customize.desc: Aqua-blue ice cream. The likeness of the earnest, adorable Blubberbeast printed on the cup adds a humorous touch, and the buttery creaminess is interwoven with a light, silken saltiness. It is as if your senses, too, have been invited to embark on an unforgettable undersea odyssey â€” one that you hope shall never end!

customize.name: Suspicious Blubbercream
customize.desc: Aqua-blue ice cream. The large chunks of sea salt ambushed your taste buds, causing you to blank out... By the time you mustered up the valor to try again, the dessert had melted into more of a milkshake...

customize.name: Blubbercream
customize.desc: Aqua-blue ice cream. The best way to while away a sweltering day is by enjoying some refreshing ice cream. It chills the body and cools the soul, giving one a feeling akin to having leaped into the sea, all worries dissipating as the heat flees your mouth, leaving naught but pure joy.

customize.name: Milk
customize.desc: Sweet and fragrant cow's milk. Don't waste a single drop, not even that one rolling down your chin.

customize.name: Sugar
customize.desc: A seasoning derived from Sweet Flowers. Has the power to give both energy and happiness.

customize.name: Salt
customize.desc: A savory seasoning. A precise but adequate amount will elevate the quality of the cuisine.

customize.name: Cream
customize.desc: A dairy product made from milk. An essential ingredient in making pastries.
